# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its high value and potential impact on your business, I propose an offer of $10,000 for the product. This price reflects its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers to you, valued at $12,000. I am confident this deal will be mutually beneficial and contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
